title: Percy Jackson and the Olympians: Books I-III
description: Collecting The Lightning Thief, The Sea of Monsters, and The Titans' CurseHumans and half-bloods agree—Percy Jackson and the Olympians is a series fit for heroes! Relive the adventure from the beginning with this eBook set containing the first three books from the best-selling series: The Lighting Thief, The Sea of Monsters, and The Titan’s Curse.
author: Rick Riordan
